website_summaries.verdict: Works nicely for martial arts, as the pad has the flexibility required for quick arm movements.
pros: Does not cover the elbow, which those who need maximum freedom of movement will appreciate
Wrist coverage area has a slight curve to it, which enhances comfort
Price is lower than you’d expect, especially considering the pad is 1/2-inch thick
cons: Some customers complain about odd sizing problems

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fist and wrist guards!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how great these were until I had to use them. They cover the entire back of the hand all the way down the forearm. The padding is just covering the back of a person's arm, but they can be rotated if needed. There are 3 openings for fingers. 2 sets for the main 4 fingers and a large hole for the thumb. Also, I didn't realize that this was a pair of forearm guards in one package. I accidentally ordered 2 packages because I didn't believe a high quality product like this, would come in at such a great price for a pair of guards. I was happily mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: The Dan

customer_reviews.title: Super Hero Protection
customer_reviews.text: I call these my Super Hero sleeves. I have actions purpura which means I bruise like a pear and it takes nothing to tear the skin on my forearms. These are absolutely the BEST protection I've found to work on my car, reach into boxes and storage and do the things that would shred me otherwise. Worth every penny. Easy to machine wash and air dry.I'll be ordering additional pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Larry DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: You DO NOT get the item pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the arm guards pictured above and this is the second time they’ve sent me the wrong pair. I want to pair with a hand can go all the way through and I don’t have to worry about threads digging into fingers or awkward thumb holes that are hard to fit on smaller Hands. Which is why I ordered this pair. And yet they sent me the same pair that has threads that go between the fingers, and are not very sturdy I might add, and has a large very low said thumb hole that I cannot get to fit on my hand comfortably. Do not buy from this listing if you want was actually pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Whysteria

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The guards were exactly what I was looking for....I was looking for something to protect my arms when working outside in the yard. Due to my multiple myeloma, my skin is like tissue paper. These are perfect and will protect my skin from bruising and scrapes. So thankful to find something that provides protection and will keep me from going to the doctor so often....and I can continue doing the outside work that gives me such satisfaction. They are also not real tight to cause pressure on any existing bandaged area. Kudos for such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for purpura sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: Like many who buy this, when I turned 60, purpura started and the skin on my arms became very thin, a light brush up against most anything caused a bruise. These arm guards are lifesavers. Strongly recommend for any kind of work where you might bump into anything or something that will scratch

product_meta.title: PROFORCE Forearm Guard, Black (Medium)
product_meta.description: Your forearms make a lot of blocks when sparring, so you need to make sure they have proper protection. Our forearm guard features 1/2" of padding from wrist to elbow to help cushion the blows. For better flexibility a curved joint has been designed.
